tool_description: Allow your users to "Like"/"Dislike" a subject/event/topic/post/etc.
name: Like Functionality
title: Like Functionality

api_list.name: Retrieve Like data for Entry
api_list.description: This will retrieve the # of likes/dislikes towards the given entry via the provided "postId".

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: The user Id to identify which user added the Like/Dislike value towards the entry. This is required and will return a value that will let you know if this user liked, disliked, or did not like/dislike the entry.

required_parameters.name: postId
required_parameters.description: The Id of the entry to retrieve the like/dislike data.

postId.description: The id of the entry that tracks the like data

likesCount.description: The like count for the entry. If positive, the entry is liked. If negative, the majority of response is dislike.

userLike.description: The specific like/dislike value the user selected for this entry. 1 = like, -1 = dislike, 0 = nothing selected
